Engineering.name: JEE (Main & Advanced)
Engineering.info: The most important exam for admission to undergraduate engineering programs at IITs, NITs, IIITs, and other top institutions.

Engineering.name: BITSAT
Engineering.info: A competitive computer-based online test for admission to the integrated first-degree programs of BITS Pilani campuses.

Engineering.name: VITEEE
Engineering.full_name: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination
Engineering.info: A national level entrance exam for admission to engineering programs at VIT campuses.

Engineering.name: GATE
Engineering.info: A prestigious national-level exam for admission into Master's (M.Tech) programs and for recruitment by various Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs). It tests the comprehensive understanding of various undergraduate subjects in engineering and science.
colleges: PSUs like ONGC, IOCL, BHEL for jobs

Medical.name: NEET-UG
Medical.info: The single, all-India entrance examination for students who wish to study undergraduate medical (MBBS) and dental (BDS) courses.

Law.name: CLAT
Law.info: A centralized national level entrance test for admissions to 22 National Law Universities (NLUs) in India.

Law.name: AILET
Law.info: Conducted specifically for admission to the B.A. LLB (Hons.) program at National Law University, Delhi (NLU-D).

Design.name: NID DAT
Design.full_name: National Institute of Design - Design Aptitude Test
Design.info: A two-stage entrance exam for admission to Bachelor of Design (B.Des) and Master of Design (M.Des) programs at NIDs.

Design.name: NIFT Entrance Exam
Design.full_name: National Institute of Fashion Technology Entrance Exam
Design.info: An entrance exam for admission to design (B.Des) and technology (B.F.Tech) programs at NIFT campuses across India.

Design.name: UCEED
Design.full_name: Undergraduate Common Entrance Examination for Design
Design.info: Conducted by IIT Bombay for admission to Bachelor of Design (B.Des) programs at IIT Bombay, IIT Delhi, IIT Guwahati, and IIT Hyderabad.

Management.name: CAT
Management.info: The premier entrance exam for admission to MBA and other postgraduate management programs at all IIMs and many other top B-schools in India.

Management.name: XAT
Management.info: A national-level management entrance test for admission to XLRI Jamshedpur and other prestigious management institutes.
